ai-patthana21.47:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.47:0.3_0: for those who attack their vows, like universal for themselves,
ai-patthana21.47:1.1_0: Not for the sake of defilement, or for the sake of repulsion, sexual intercourse, and only with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana21.47:2.1_0: don’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...
ai-patthana21.47:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.47:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.47:3.1_0: Neither Protector’s backwards or the way beginning has three universalities, and three the for the sake of countering ...
ai-patthana21.47:3.1_1: one person is building up one another while mutually saying:
ai-patthana21.47:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.47:4.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion regarding lacking regard for the unknowing. This is a cause of no defilements.
ai-patthana21.47:4.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
